DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to translate and validate the CAM-ICU for use in the Korean ICU setting.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of the Korean Confusion Assessment Method for the Intensive Care Unit (CAM-ICU)
DOC.criteria: older than 18 years admitted to medical ICU at Seoul National University Hospital longer than 24 hours comatose or moribund state throughout the study period preexisting neurologic problem
